results.name: a(n) = Sum_{k=1..n} (-1)^A000120(3*k).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
P. J. Grabner, A note on the parity of the sum-of-digits function, Séminaire Lotharingien de Combinatoire, B30e (1993), 8 pp.
mathematica: A036555 := Total /@ IntegerDigits[3 Range[1, 130], 2]; Table[Sum[ (-1)^A036555[[k]], {k, 1, n}], {n, 1, 50}] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Jan 01 2017 *)
results.author: _Ralf Stephan_, Sep 27 2004
ext: Typo in name corrected by _Michel Marcus_, Dec 03 2016
